entry.name: index
entry.title: Create an App from the Archetype
entry.displayName: Create an App from the Archetype
entry.description: Generate a project structure by using a Maven Archetype. The Archetype will generate all the boilerplate required to get a fresh project started.

entry.name: from-scratch/
entry.description: If you can't, or prefer not to use a Maven Archetype, the following steps will guide you through the creation of a new application from scratch.

entry.name: Bootstrap-Code
entry.title: Hook in the Bootstrap Process
entry.description: GWTP aims to make the initial configuration of new projects as simple as possible.
